title: Back
lyrics: Can you save me, can you save me Gieokhaejwo ne seorapsoge Gieokhaejwo ne jigapsoge Naega itdeon heunjeokdeureul Hanado ppajimeobsi saegyeojwo Chueokhaejwo geu sajin soge Namaitdeon geu gonggan soge Nae hyanggi da nae sumgyeol da Sarajiji anke Jebal nal jinachyeo un bomnalcheoreom Baramcheoreom nochima Can you save Can you save me Geurae nal seuchyeo jinan hyanggicheoreom Sumanheun naldeul malgo Can you save Can you save me  Save me Dorawajwo I want you back back back back back Back back back back back Neowa nae gieok nak sigane matgyeoduji ma Dorawajwo I want you back back back back back Back back back back back Gidarilge na yeogi namgyeojin chae doraseon chae I say save me   (save) Can you save me Ijeul beophan gieokdeureul hanadulssik doedollyeo Gyejeori jana gyejeoreul maja Neol dasi nae pume Jebal nal jinachyeo un bomnalcheoreom Baramcheoreom nochima Can you save Can you save me Geurae nal seuchyeo jinan hyanggicheoreom Sumanheun naldeul malgo Can you save Can you save me Sigane matgiji ma Nal chueolharyeo haji ma jebal jebal jebal Hanado jiujineun ma Dorawajwo I want you back back back back back Back back back back back Neowa nae gieok nak sigane matgyeoduji ma Dorawajwo I want you back back back back back Back back back back back Gidarilge na yeogi namgyeojin chae doraseon chae I say save me
